[enemy]
# Venom Bat
type=venombat
location=12,17,9,9
level=3,3
number=1,1

[enemy]
# 2 snakes
type=snake
location=11,17,9,9
level=1,1
number=2,2

[event]
# Chest
type=on_trigger
location=22,15,1,1
hotspot=location
loot=300,22,16,fixed,1
mapmod=object,22,15,206
repeat=false
requires_not_status=snaketalis
tooltip=Chest

[event]
# Teleport to Castle3
type=on_trigger
location=15,31,2,1
intermap=maps/castle3.txt,14,11

[event]
# Teleport to CastleB
type=on_trigger
location=0,15,1,4
intermap=maps/castleb.txt,30,11
